name: Dissertation
body:
### Perceptual and Working Memory Deficits
by Jason Locklin, 

jalockli at uwaterloo.ca

A thesis
presented to the University of Waterloo
in fulfillment of the
thesis requirement for the degree of
Doctorate of Philosophy
in
Congitive Neuroscience

Waterloo, Ontario, Canada, 2015


Source files can be browsed or downloaded from [github.com/JasonLocklin/Dissertation](https://github.com/JasonLocklin/Dissertation).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
